verses.name: Acts 5:30
verses.text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom ye slew and hanged on a tree.

verses.name: Acts 5:31
verses.text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.

verses.name: Acts 5:32
verses.text: And we are his witnesses of these things; and so is also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.

verses.name: Acts 5:33
verses.text: When they heard that, they were cut to the heart, and took counsel to slay them.
